channel.title: What specs would I need for Black Mesa?
channel.description: I'm sorry if I'm asking something I shouldn't but what are the maximum specifications I'd need for Black Mesa when it is released? Would I need Unreal Development Kit compatible hardware or hardware that is HL2: Episode 2 compatible?

item.title: What specs would I need for Black Mesa?
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
To run black mesa you need at least exactly the following:

Cheap ATX PC case.
Antec 380W Max PSU.
Mobo: ASUS P5KPL-CM G31 Chipset.
CPU: Intel Core 2 Duo E4500 Overclocked to 3.98Ghz.
RAM: 4 gigs of 800MHz Dual Channel (Half Dell half Kingston) DDR2 overclocked to 1000MHz and 5-5-5-15.
GPU: Dual slot ASUS Geforce 8800GT overclocked to 661/1638/955 respectively.
HDD : WD Caviar green, 640GB SATA. 250GB Laptop HDD for pagefile and movies.
HUGE ASS Copper CPU heatsync from unknown company.
Some cheap LED’s and fans to make it look pretty.

or anything that runs HL2:EP2 on max settings smoothly without crashing or overheating. :fffuuu:

Read full topic
item.source: What specs would I need for Black Mesa?
